entities.name: whomping willow
entities.description: The Whomping Willow is a magical tree that is mentioned in the text. It is described as being 61 years old and is likely a significant landmark at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He is called over to look at the Sorting Hat with Ron.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is the main dining hall at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It is described as having innumerable candles hovering in mid-air over four long tables.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a bespectacled witch who is placing the Sorting Hat on a stool before the newcomers. She has her hair in a tight bun.

entities.name: harry potter (again)
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned again as remembering how the Sorting Hat works.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It is mentioned as being one of the houses that the Sorting Hat sorts students into.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: Hufflepuff is another house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It is mentioned alongside Gryffindor as being one of the houses that the Sorting Hat sorts students into.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is a house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It is mentioned alongside Gryffindor and Hufflepuff as being one of the houses that the Sorting Hat sorts students into.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is a house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It is mentioned alongside Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, and Ravenclaw as being one of the houses that the Sorting Hat sorts students into.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned as being amongst the first-years filing into the Great Hall.

relationships.description: Harry Potter looks at the Sorting Hat with Ron in the Great Hall.
Professor McGonagall places the Sorting Hat on a stool before the newcomers.
Harry Potter is friends with Ginny Weasley, who is amongst the first-years filing into the Great Hall.
